Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{3: 'With the information from the captain, everyone hurried to the special research lab used to create and research humanoid-hybrid Constructs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'I can\'t believe the "Amberia" that brought destruction upon the ARU still lives...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'According to the captain... That means all those people that were captured were just scapegoats.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'While the ones in the know, the ones that decided to hide Amberia... They all got off scot-free and kept this a secret until now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While preparing the equipment, Simon carefully analyzed the information at hand while Diana gazed off into the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, while we have the time, let me perform maintenance on your Polar Soldier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You know how to?', 3: '10', 4: "You're not checking on Diana?", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Just a little. Sometimes the kids will play with them while the fishermen aren't looking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "To the Forest Guards, this place is the beginning and the end. There's no need to worry about Diana. She can handle herself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta deactivated her floatation and kneeled in the snow. She carefully checked the seal between the joints of the outer armor without even a single scratch going unchecked.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "You sure are amazing, Rosetta. Not only can you fight, you're also quite the skilled mechanic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "What can I say? I'm just trying my best.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "It's more than that. You must be real talented. Me, I can't even hold a candle to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm just trying my best. I always run into trouble, so I gotta make sure I'm prepared for anything.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{3: 'With the preparations complete, you continue on until you reach the front gate of the research lab.'}
{3: 'You see a dilapidated gate before you. The wall is covered in varying degrees of damage. Looking through some of the busted windows, you see the vacant interior.'}
{3: 'The building appears to be on the verge of collapse.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "What's going on here...? Why are there bionics here?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You expected some stray bionics, but not a situation like the one before your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'ROAR!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bionics are tunneling in and out of the unguarded building, emptying it of research equipment and parts.'}
{2: 'Stop them!', 3: '3000', 4: 'Are they looking for the code too?!', 5: '3001'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Stop where you are, bionics!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "If so, their actions before don't make much sense... Forget it. We don't have time for this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Boss, we gotta stop them!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Diana, there's got to be some roadblock devices nearby!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Yeah. We can activate them, and it should stop the bionics in their tracks.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'But looks like some of them already ran into the research lab.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Leave 'em to me and Diana. They can't outrun us, Commandant. Think you can handle activating the roadblocks?", 4: '2'}
{2: "Do you know where it's located?", 3: '33', 4: 'Think you two can handle it?', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'If I remember correctly, they should be deployed around several locations with natural obstacles.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We can handle these stragglers.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Bionics are charging into the building!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let's get moving, Commandant!", 4: '2'}
